changeSet.author: pegah
changeSet.sql: UPDATE field_settings SET order_number = 1 Where field_settings_id <> 0 and field_settings_id in (SELECT field_settings_id from (select * FROM field_settings ) as something Where something.ddp_instance_id in (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where instance_name = 'RGP') and something.column_name = "FAMILY_NOTES" and field_type = 'r');

changeSet.author: pegah
changeSet.sql: UPDATE field_settings SET order_number = 2 Where field_settings_id <> 0 and field_settings_id in (SELECT field_settings_id from (select * FROM field_settings ) as something Where something.ddp_instance_id in (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where instance_name = 'RGP') and something.column_name = "SQR_PROJECT" and field_type = 'r');

changeSet.author: pegah
changeSet.sql: UPDATE field_settings SET order_number = 3 Where field_settings_id <> 0 and field_settings_id in (SELECT field_settings_id from (select * FROM field_settings ) as something Where something.ddp_instance_id in (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where instance_name = 'RGP') and something.column_name = "EXPECTED_NUMBER_TO_SEQUENCE" and field_type = 'r');

changeSet.author: pegah
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ddp_participant_record SET additional_values_json = JSON_SET(COALESCE(additional_values_json, '{}'),'$.SQR_PROJECT','HMB') WHERE participant_record_id <> 0 and participant_record_id in ( SELECT participant_record_id from ( SELECT participant_record_id, p.ddp_instance_id, d.data FROM ddp_participant_data d LEFT JOIN ddp_participant p ON (d.ddp_participant_id = p.ddp_participant_id) LEFT JOIN ddp_participant_record r ON (r.participant_id = p.participant_id) ) as something WHERE something.ddp_instance_id in (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where instance_name = 'RGP') and JSON_EXTRACT(data, "$.DATE_ENROLLED") IS NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: pegah
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ddp_participant_record SET additional_values_json = JSON_SET(COALESCE(additional_values_json, '{}'),'$.SQR_PROJECT','UNKNOWN') WHERE participant_record_id <> 0 and participant_record_id in ( SELECT participant_record_id from ( SELECT participant_record_id, p.ddp_instance_id, d.data FROM ddp_participant_data d LEFT JOIN ddp_participant p ON (d.ddp_participant_id = p.ddp_participant_id) LEFT JOIN ddp_participant_record r ON (r.participant_id = p.participant_id) ) as something WHERE something.ddp_instance_id in (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where instance_name = 'RGP') and JSON_EXTRACT(data, "$.DATE_ENROLLED") IS NULL );
